description: The versatile Renegade™ Cargo Convertible Men’s Pant is cut from Kuhl’s innovative Duralux™ fabric.  This strong, yet breathable, material also provides quick-drying, anti-abrasion, and superior sun protection (UPF 50) properties that will keep you on the move.  The Stealth™ zip-off design allows you to discretely transition from pants to shorts with ease.
name: Kuhl Renegade Cargo Convertible Pants, 30" Inseam - Mens

specs.value: Duralux Softshell - 95% Nylon, 5% Spandex DWR - 170 g
two front hand, two side cargo with snap closure, zipper pocket inside left cargo, cell phone pocket inside right cargo, two back with Velcro closure
